# ics_ssh_key (Resource)

Manages an SSH key in ICS for server access.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "ics_ssh_key" "example" {
  label      = "my-ssh-key"
  public_key = "ssh-rsa AAAAB3NzaC1yc2EAAAADAQABAAACAQ... user@hostname"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `label` (String) A unique label for the SSH key
- `public_key` (String) The public SSH key content

### Optional

- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `fingerprint` (String) The fingerprint of the SSH key

<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
terraform import ics_ssh_key.example ssh-key-id
```
